channel.title: CVE Feed for Acurax Technologies -- Floating Social Media Icon (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acurax Technologies -- Floating Social Media Icon (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2021-36843|2024-08-04T01:01:59.683Z -- acurax%20technologies -- floating%20social%20media%20icon%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability discovered in WordPress Floating Social Media Icon plugin (versions <= 4.3.5) Social Media Configuration form. Requires high role user like admin.
